name: iSolution
description:
iSolution was founded in 2004 with a thought of providing creative and latest web and mobile technologies for your business. We deliver robust solutions using latest technologies and frameworks: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Core PHP, My SQL, Laravel, Yii2 and Cake PHP. Our long journey to date consists of many different innovations and experiences. We not only create designs or applications but also help you to open new channels for your business.
We stand as professional experts in creating Websites, Web Applications, E-Commerce Solutions, and Mobile ( Android and IOS )Apps. Our expertise in Web Marketing will help lift your brand and make your business popular on search engines.
As a product, we have created a SaaS enabled e-Commerce platform "Shopaccino" - a smarter way to create online stores. Another SaaS enabled CRM application "Task officer" is for managing leads.
Our 12 years of experience helps us meet the client's criteria by building long and trustful relationships that allow us to deliver perfect IT solutions, making them feel assured that their digital presence and business are in very capable hands.
We have 500+ satisfied clients across the globe. Our global reach speaks everything. Start a project with us today and let's discuss your business plan.
